column9: Tis neither body nor soul, for I belong

column8: >I have seen the two worlds are one
>One I seek, One I know, One I see,
>He is the first, He is the last.
>He is the outward, He is the inward

column1: This t-shirt design admires Rumi - a Persian
column2: poet and philosopher during the 13th century. Born in Afghanistan,&nbsp
column3:
Rumi's importance transcends national and ethnic borders. Readers of the Persian language in Iran, Afghanistan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan see him as one of their most significant classical poets and an influence on many poets through history.
